subject: Enhance hours microprompts with gotcha handling
description:
Update microprompts in website_locations category to handle:
- "24/7" or "Open 24 hours"
- Split hours (lunch break)
- "By appointment only"
- "Call for hours"
- Emergency/after-hours
- Multiple departments (Sales, Service, Parts, Body Shop, Idealease)

metadata.evidence: File: `workflows/website_rag/temp/website_locations_category_config.js:142-144` contains: `instruction: "Day-by-day hours object. CRITICAL GOTCHAS: (1) '24/7'/'24 hours'/'Open 24 hours' -> '24 hours' (2) Split hours with lunch break -> '8:00 AM - 12:00 PM, 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM'`
